data.actual_result: It shows the value in bps, e.g 64000
data.expected_result: Should show the value in Kbps, e.g 64
data.short_description: [Audit Logs] Wrong unit used for bitrate values
data.steps_to_repro: - Make changes to the bitrate of a voice channel - Go to Audit Logs - Expand the entry corresponding to the bitrate change - Observe value
